title: Stranger
text: But you should know, your first challenge already begun! Why don't you try querying the townsfolk table?

title: Stranger
text: Oh, you are on your journey to SQLand? Great! Learning SQL is really useful!

title: Sarah
text: I only need to find my guide, they should be somewhere nearby. Maybe one of the townspeople would know who they are!

title: Sarah
text: Alright, it's time to start my journey in SQLand, the place where anyone can learn SQL!
